spec_data.Name: fedora-gooey-karma
spec_data.Description:
Fedora-gooey-karma helps you to easily and fast provide feedback for all testing
updates that you have currently installed and browse the available ones. It is
similar tool to fedora-easy-karma but with graphical front-end.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 27 Feb 2017 02:24:36 AM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: GUI tool for sending feedback about installed Test Update packages
